basics.name: Accountant II
basics.label: Accounting Professional
basics.summary: Detail-oriented Accountant with 5 years effectively maintaining accurate accounting information for large-scale financial organizations. Superior attention to detail and strong communication skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for preparing and posting entries for the daily posting packet. Manages accounts payable function and Corporate VISA accounts. Assists with the preparation of financial statements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Overseen business expense processing for multiple business units. Maintained knowledge of Credit Union processes which affect the general ledger. Assisted with the preparation of financial statements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed a variety of support duties related to the accounting function within the credit union. Supervised two Accounting Clerks Staffs. Responsible for ensuring staff are adequately trained in all phases of their jobs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided customers with prompt, accurate, courteous and professional banking service. Assisted customers with opening and closing of accounts. Accepted and processed loan applications.
